channel.title: Dvd burning?
channel.description:
Well I borrowed a movie from a friend and want to burn it onto a dvd-r cd..I do have a dvd burner,and nero 7,its already converted into video ts files...I just need to know how to burn it,so it shows up with the menus and everything?
Please and thanks.[br][size=1]Posted on: April 30, 2007, 02:59:08 PM[/size][hr]Anyone please?

item.title: Dvd burning?
item.dc:creator: @Aftermath_961 Aftermath
item.description:
@Aftermath_961 wrote:

I wouldn’t mess with the files in the VIDEO_TS directory if you’re new to this stuff. It’s best to only do that if you’re going to be encoding or subtitling them. Instead, just get DVDDecrypter and make sure you rip the DVD in ISO mode. There’s a menu where you can pick the mode. Rip it to a folder somewhere. Then use a ISO burner (I recommend PowerISO, but you’ll have to either crack it or buy it to be able to burn large files) and burn it on your DVD-R.

Read full topic
